name: VIRUS 91
description:
VIRUS 91 is an adventure game with first-person shooter (FPS) elements. You have to take on the role of a sergeant and go to the laboratory, in which all the equipment is out of control. Explore mysterious locations and find out who is behind this whole situation!

Fight drones, robots and other creatures with versatile weapons! Carefully explore the locations, but be careful, danger can be waiting around every corner.

Peculiarities
- Pleasant music
- Colorful graphics
- Dangerous opponents
